Topic.Title: Who would win in a fight?

Posts.EditableText:
I've been pondering this a while and I am damned curious, who do YOU think would win in a fight between Bob Dobbs and Godzilla?

They're both a force to be messed with.

It's become my obsession. I've drawn up pictures which cannot be found [url=http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v232/RLA/KITTEN1.jpg:retat86i]here[/url:retat86i], [url=http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v232/RLA/05-22-05_1456.jpg:retat86i]here[/url:retat86i], [url=http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v232/RLA/Bunny--Tetris.jpg:retat86i]here[/url:retat86i] or [url=http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v232/RLA/06-21-05_2352.jpg:retat86i]here.[/url:retat86i]

I refuse to put up a poll. Polls anger me.

Just tell me what you think, Chuckles.

Everyone else gets three bizzilion replies, but I ask a simple question and get crap.

Man, what a world. What a world.

... And I hate Godzilla.

... So basically they both can die a horrible, horrible death from some kind of Salad Finger guy..
